events.message: I received my order yesterday, but unfortunately the laptop screen has a large scratch and there seems to be some damage to the keyboard as well.
The reported issue has been categorized as a product defect due to the reported scratch and keyboard damage.
Your case has been assigned to one of our product care specialists for further assistance regarding the defective laptop.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the issues with your laptop. I’ll help you get this sorted out as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide photos of the scratched screen and damaged keyboard as well as your order number to expedite this process?
Thank you for your quick response. I have attached photos showing the scratches and damage, and my order number is 123456789.
Thank you for sending the details. We can offer you a replacement unit or a full refund, whichever you prefer. Please let us know your choice.
I would prefer a replacement unit as I still want to use this model. Thank you for the prompt support and the options provided.
We have arranged for a replacement laptop to be shipped to you immediately, and you should receive a tracking number shortly.
Checking in to confirm your replacement laptop arrived in perfect condition and that you are satisfied with the resolution.
Yes, the replacement arrived yesterday and everything looks great now. Thanks for resolving this so smoothly!
We’re glad we could help! Your case has now been closed. Please contact us if you need anything else in the future.
We’ve sent you a short survey to gather your feedback on the support experience today; your input is very valuable to us.
